thread.title: Supreme Court verdict in DA case: What will happen to Jayalalithaa’s properties?
thread.title_full: Supreme Court verdict in DA case: What will happen to Jayalalithaa’s properties?

author: A Subramani
title: Supreme Court verdict in DA case: What will happen to Jayalalithaa’s properties?
text:
CHENNAI: The judicial sledgehammer which smashed the political future of AIADMK general secretary V K Sasikala has put spotlight on the status of vast estates, gold, buildings and diamonds that remain seized by courts. 

Authorities must now move in first to remand the three convicts - - V K Sasikala, J Ilayaraja and V N Sudhagaran - - in jails in Karnataka, then collect a total of Rs 130 crore as fine. The fine will be collected from all four, including Jayalalithaa . 

The 250-odd properties attached by the court will now have to be seized and taken possession by authorities. 

Next process in this regard steps will have to start soon. 

The AIADMK on paper has right to file review petitions.
